position: Product @ AmericanExpress | Product @ Multiplier | InMobi | CDC, IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: Multiplier is APAC's 1st global talent enablement platform which allows companies to employ anyone, anywhere in a few clicks, using a global compliance, payroll, and payments platform.Building Multiplier by assisting the Product team in automating payroll report downloads for 36 countries using JSONs and analysing customer invoice data to implement impactful features.
experience.description_html: Multiplier is APAC's 1st global talent enablement platform which allows companies to employ anyone, anywhere in a few clicks, using a global compliance, payroll, and payments platform.Building Multiplier by assisting the Product team in automating payroll report downloads for 36 countries using JSONs and analysing customer invoice data to implement impactful features. <!---->

experience.title: Business Operations Intern
experience.description: • Assisted InMobi Commerce Cloud operations by creating demo advertisements for approximately 78 Retailers to close the new brand-retailer advertising strategy.• Initiated Look Books, a static way to present video advertisements.• Designed an account allocation model called Account Pyramid to track and optimize the progress on quality and number of leads and number of accounts per person using weekly updates from US Team Sales Directors.
experience.description_html: • Assisted InMobi Commerce Cloud operations by creating demo advertisements for approximately 78 Retailers to close the new brand-retailer advertising strategy.• Initiated Look Books, a static way to present video advertisements.• Designed an account allocation model called Account Pyramid to track and optimize the progress on quality and number of leads and number of accounts per person using weekly updates from US Team Sales Directors. <!---->

experience.title: Student Placement Coordinator
experience.description: Objective : Part of a 17 member team selected by a panel of Deans for execution of placements and internship drives for 3500+ students• Achieved 1,000+ job offers in 3 days of execution (fastest till date among IITs) with 71% YoY growth; bagged highest placement offers across all IITs• Coordinated with 500+ firms and registered 1000+ profiles (highest till date); successfully negotiated hiring numbers, profiles and eligibility with firms• Facilitated CV building workshop for internship students which saw a participation of 1000+; Achieved internship offers of 900+(51% YoY increase)• Coordinated a team of 35 departmental representatives fruitfully to handle screening tests, placement talks, and interviews of 200+ organizations
